title: WTH Riot Servers Never Even Went Down.
body: Whats the deal with this?? You post something saying servers will go down at 3AM and nothing happens.. Precious game time wasted...

replies.body: (Edited) According to our status page, servers were intended to be down for a short duration.   Be sure to bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page for live issues and updates.  Hope that helps!

*Coughs* 
Network Operations â€“ Yesterday at 10:13 PM

At 03:00 Pacific time (11:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

Indeed, my bad.  According to the status, servers were supposed to go down for a short period.  Unfortunately, I can't confirm one way or the other (I was asleep!).  OP may have also returned after services were restored.
Nope it never went down ranked was supposed to be up with the preseason patch when it was down or well supposed to go down
To offer an update, the downtime on the status page has not happened yet and is actually intended for tonight.

I figured it was bit early and at this point I had assumed it was intended to Wednesday morning as your updates usually take place Tuesday night/Wednesday morning. It was just false hope hoping that the patch would come a day early. I really wanted that update. lol
Is this for preseason update or no?
